amendment.description: To require a report relating to the challenges that food distribution programs face in reaching underserved populations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 961 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 1. Record Vote Number: 334.

action.text: Amendment SA 961 proposed by Senator Cortez Masto to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6183-6184, S6186; text: CR S6183) To require a report relating to the challenges that food distribution programs face in reaching underserved populations.
